name: Toy Car climb racing - Vroomz
description:
Bring back great childhood memories and play Vroomz - Online Toy Car Racing game! Experience fun in racing small remote-controlled cars against other players in fast-paced PVP matches. Make amazing tricks like Backflips or Frontflips to be even faster. Race for victory!

- Fun control mechanics
- Crazy toy car physics
- Compete against other players
- Win races and collect trophies to unlock new cars and tracks
- Switch between different cars, like Monster Trucks, Buggies or Formula
- Various tracks spread across different rooms at home - kid's room, kitchen, bathroom, cellar
